title: RP ADDTO: First and second members of an ordered pair

blocks.name: elcnvlem
blocks.content: Two ways to say a set is a member of the converse of a class. (Contributed by RP, 19-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elcnvlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccnv(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ccnv(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c1)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)))))
  elcnv2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  copsex2gb(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c1))
  eleq1d(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  syl6eq(cfv(c2, c0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c2, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, universe)))
  opelvv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  fvmpt(s0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, universe), c2, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))
  opeq12d(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(hs1), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op2ndd(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  op1std(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opex(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elcnvlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ `' c1 â†”(c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(c2 ` c0)âˆˆ c1))
  âŠ£ c2 =(s0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â†¦ <(2nd ` s0),(1st ` s0)>)
} = {
  bitri(c0 âˆˆ `' c1, (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(c2 ` c0)âˆˆ c1), âˆƒ(hs0, âˆƒ(hs1,(c0 = < hs0, hs1 > âˆ§ < hs1, hs0 > âˆˆ c1))))
  elcnv2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  copsex2gb(hs0, hs1, c0, < hs1, hs0 > âˆˆ c1, (c2 ` c0)âˆˆ c1)
  eleq1d((c2 ` c0), c1, < hs1, hs0 >, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  syl6eq((c2 ` c0), < hs1, hs0 >, (c2 ` < hs0, hs1 >), c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  fveq2(c0, < hs0, hs1 >, c2)
  ax-mp((c2 ` < hs0, hs1 >)= < hs1, hs0 >, < hs0, hs1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  opelvv(hs0, hs1)
  fvmpt(s0, < hs0, hs1 >, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), c2, < hs1, hs0 >, <(2nd ` s0),(1st ` s0)>)
  opeq12d((2nd ` s0), (1st ` s0), hs1, hs0, s0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  op2ndd(s0, hs0, hs1)
  op1std(s0, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opex(hs1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ` c0)âˆˆ c1)
  diff.hs1.w((c2 ` c0)âˆˆ c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs0, hs1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elcnvintab
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a set is an element of the converse of the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 19-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elcnvintab(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccnv(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elmapintab(s0, c0, ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w0))), cxp(universe, universe), ccnv(cv(s0)), cmpt(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  elcnvlem(hs0, c0, cint(cab(s0, w0)), cmpt(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  elcnvlem(hs0, c0, cv(s0), cmpt(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, cxp(universe, universe), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, cv(hs0))
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, cv(hs0))
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elcnvintab(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ `' â‹‚ { s0 | w0 } â†”(c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ `' s0))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elmapintab(s0, c0, `' â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), `' s0, (hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â†¦ <(2nd ` hs0),(1st ` hs0)>), w0)
  elcnvlem(hs0, c0, â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }, (hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â†¦ <(2nd ` hs0),(1st ` hs0)>))
  elcnvlem(hs0, c0, s0, (hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â†¦ <(2nd ` hs0),(1st ` hs0)>))
  eqid((hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â†¦ <(2nd ` hs0),(1st ` hs0)>))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), <(2nd ` hs0),(1st ` hs0)>)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, (2nd ` hs0), (1st ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, hs0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, hs0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cnvintabd
blocks.content: Value of the converse of the intersection of a nonempty class. (Contributed by RP, 20-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), w1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), w1)))), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), w1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(s0)))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(s0)))))))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(s0))))), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  bicomd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  syl(w0, wb(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wex(s0, w1))
  pm5.5(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  elcnvintab(s0, cv(hs0), w1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), w1))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(cv(s0))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elmapintrab(s1, s0, cv(hs0), universe, cxp(universe, universe), ccnv(cv(s0)), w1)
  cnvex(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  mpbi(wss(ccnv(cv(s0)), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  relcnv(cv(s0))
  df-rel(ccnv(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), w1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnvintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ `' â‹‚ { s0 | w1 } = â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' s0 âˆ§ w1))})
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0, w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, `' â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }, â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' s0 âˆ§ w1))}, w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 âˆˆ `' â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }, hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' s0 âˆ§ w1))}, (hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ `' s0))), ((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ `' s0))))
  anbi1d(w0, hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ `' s0)), (âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)))
  bicomd(w0, hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), (âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)))
  syl(w0, ((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))â†” hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)), âˆƒ(s0, w1))
  pm5.5(âˆƒ(s0, w1), hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  elcnvintab(s0, hs0, w1)
  ax-mp((hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' s0 âˆ§ w1))} â†”((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ `' s0)))), hs0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(hs0)
  elmapintrab(s1, s0, hs0, universe, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), `' s0, w1)
  cnvex(s0)
  vex(s0)
  mpbi(`' s0 âŠ†(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), Rel(`' s0))
  relcnv(s0)
  df-rel(`' s0)
  diff.hs0.c(`' â‹‚ { s0 | w1 })
  diff.hs0.c(â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' s0 âˆ§ w1))})
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
